articles.description: England face West Indies in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Dubai International Stadium, Dubai – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Former Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel holds talks with the Football Association about becoming the next England manager.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel: FA holds talks with ex-Chelsea boss over England role

articles.description: England are defied by a century on debut by Pakistan’s Kamran Ghulam on the opening day of the second Test in Multan.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Kamran Ghulam makes hundred on debut in Multan

articles.description: Sadio Mane scores an injury-time winner to secure Senegal's qualification for Afcon 2025, while DR Congo also book their place in Morocco.
articles.title: Afcon 2025: Senegal and DR Congo qualify for finals in Morocco

articles.description: A new study has shown Premier League players under the age of 21 are spending longer out injured than ever before.
articles.title: Premier League: New study reveals players under 21 'suffering more injuries'

articles.description: Arsenal confirm that head coach Jonas Eidevall has resigned after just over three years in charge.
articles.title: Jonas Eidevall: Arsenal head coach resigns after three years in charge

articles.description: England's Euro 2022 final match-winner Chloe Kelly is included in the Lionesses squad for the friendlies with Germany and South Africa.
articles.title: Lionesses squad announcement: Chloe Kelly keeps her place while Lucy Parker is called up

articles.description: Vote now for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024, with the winner announced on 26 November.
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024: Voting open with winner announced on 26 November

articles.description: The Buffalo Bills pile further misery on the New York Jets with a 23-20 victory at MetLife Stadium in New Jersey.
articles.title: NFL: New York Jets beaten by Buffalo Bills despite Aaron Rodgers 'Hail Mary'

articles.description: Fallen giants Bordeaux face a "chaotic new reality" in France's fourth tier, but how will they escape it?
articles.title: Bordeaux: How French giants ended up in fourth tier - and how will they get out?
